name: garner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to collect something, usually after much work or with difficulty: Coppola garnered several Oscar awards for "The Godfather".

Add to word list
Add to word list
to get or earn something valuable or respected, often with difficulty: Coppola garnered several Oscars for his movie, "The Godfather."
